definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Please sit down in that comfortable chair over there while I fix you some lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 我去給你倒杯檸檬水，你先坐在那張舒服的椅子上。

sentences.english: Lemonade on a hot day is very refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 在暑天喝檸檬水，會使人精神抖擻。
最喜歡的飲料是檸檬水。

sentences.english: If the fruit is fresh, juice can be made similar to lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 如果水果是新鮮的，果汁可以製成類似檸檬水的飲料。

sentences.english: Now click on the sugar to make the lemonade sweet.
sentences.chinese: 現在按一下糖是檸檬水發甜。

sentences.english: I like dirks orange juice, lemon juice, red wine and lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡喝桔子汁，檸檬汁，紅葡萄酒和檸檬水。

sentences.english: All they drink is master cleanse and laxative tea.
sentences.chinese: 他們喝的飲料都是檸檬水和瀉藥茶。

sentences.english: They had one bottle of lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 他們只帶了一瓶檸檬水。

sentences.english: She did not see why she shouldn't have had a lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 她不明白爲什麼沒要一杯檸檬水。

sentences.english: Lemonade is probably the most common of all American summer time beverages.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬水大概是美國夏日裏最常見的飲品了。

sentences.english: I am sorry. I only have mango juice and lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，我只能喝芒果汁和檸檬水。

sentences.english: May I have a lemonade?I am on the wagon.
sentences.chinese: 我現在戒酒，給我一杯檸檬水好嗎？

sentences.english: If it is light yellow like lemonade, your hydration is just right.
sentences.chinese: 如果尿液是類似檸檬水的淺黃，則證明補水量正合適。

sentences.english: Drink water or lemon water instead of juices and sodas.
sentences.chinese: 用純水或檸檬水來代替果汁和蘇打水。

sentences.english: After they madetheir purchase, they were surveyed to determine their attitude toward thelemonade.
sentences.chinese: 在他們購買以後，他們被調查了對檸檬水的態度。

sentences.english: I said "So are you drinking lemonade to avoid a hangover tonight"?
sentences.chinese: 然後我說“你喝檸檬水是想避免宿醉？”

definition: medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
Yakult (Japanese brand of fermented milk drink)
Yanshui town in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to put on weight/to get fat
